vernac_cmds: Definition sumlist_spec := DECLARE _sumlist WITH sh : share, contents : list int, p: val PRE [ _p OF (tptr t_struct_list) ] PROP(readable_share sh) LOCAL (temp _p p) SEP (lseg LS sh (map Vint contents) p nullval) POST [ tuint ] PROP() LOCAL(temp ret_temp (Vint (sum_int contents))) SEP (lseg LS sh (map Vint contents) p nullval).

Definition reverse_spec := DECLARE _reverse WITH sh : share, contents : list val, p: val PRE [ _p OF (tptr t_struct_list) ] PROP (writable_share sh) LOCAL (temp _p p) SEP (lseg LS sh contents p nullval) POST [ (tptr t_struct_list) ] EX p:val, PROP () LOCAL (temp ret_temp p) SEP (lseg LS sh (rev contents) p nullval).
Definition main_spec := DECLARE _main WITH gv : globals PRE [] main_pre prog nil gv POST [ tint ] PROP() LOCAL (temp ret_temp (Vint (Int.repr (3+2+1)))) SEP(TT).
Definition Gprog : funspecs := ltac:(with_library prog [ sumlist_spec; main_spec; reverse_spec]).
Lemma list_cell_eq: forall sh i p , sepalg.nonidentity sh -> field_compatible t_struct_list [] p -> list_cell LS sh (Vint i) p = field_at sh t_struct_list (DOT _head) (Vint i) p.

Definition sumlist_Inv (sh: share) (contents: list int) (p: val) : environ->mpred := (EX cts1: list int, EX cts2: list int, EX t: val, PROP (contents = cts1++cts2) LOCAL (temp _t t; temp _s (Vint (sum_int cts1))) SEP ( lseg LS sh (map Vint cts1) p t ; lseg LS sh (map Vint cts2) t nullval)).
Lemma sum_int_app: forall a b, sum_int (a++b) = Int.add (sum_int a) (sum_int b).
Lemma body_sumlist: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_sumlist sumlist_spec.
focus_SEP 1; apply semax_lseg_nonnull; [ | intros h' r y ? ?].
destruct cts2; inversion H0; clear H0; subst_any.
assert_PROP (field_compatible t_struct_list nil t) as FC by entailer!.
eapply derives_trans; [ | apply (lseg_cons_right_list LS) with (y:=t); auto].

Definition reverse_Inv (sh: share) (contents: list val) : environ->mpred := (EX cts1: list val, EX cts2 : list val, EX w: val, EX v: val, PROP (contents = rev cts1 ++ cts2) LOCAL (temp _w w; temp _v v) SEP (lseg LS sh cts1 w nullval; lseg LS sh cts2 v nullval)).
Lemma body_reverse: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_reverse reverse_spec.
focus_SEP 1; apply semax_lseg_nonnull; [entailer | intros h r y ? ?; simpl].
replace_SEP 2 (field_at sh t_struct_list (DOT _tail) w v) by entailer!.
destruct v; try contradiction; intro Hx; inv Hx.

Lemma setup_globals: forall Delta gv, PTree.get _three (glob_types Delta) = Some (tarray t_struct_list 3) -> ENTAIL Delta, PROP () LOCAL (gvars gv) SEP (data_at Ews tuint (Vint (Int.repr 1)) (gv _three); mapsto Ews (tptr t_struct_list) (offset_val 4 (gv _three)) (offset_val 8 (gv _three)); mapsto Ews tuint (offset_val 8 (gv _three)) (Vint (Int.repr 2)); mapsto Ews (tptr t_struct_list) (offset_val 12 (gv _three)) (offset_val 16 (gv _three)); mapsto Ews tuint (offset_val 16 (gv _three)) (Vint (Int.repr 3)); mapsto Ews tuint (offset_val 20 (gv _three)) (Vint (Int.repr 0))) |-- PROP() LOCAL(gvars gv) SEP (lseg LS Ews (map Vint (Int.repr 1 :: Int.repr 2 :: Int.repr 3 :: nil)) (gv _three) nullval).
assert_PROP (size_compatible tuint (gv _three) /\ align_compatible tuint (gv _three)) by (entailer!; clear - H5; hnf in H5; intuition).
rewrite <- mapsto_data_at with (v := Vint(Int.repr 1)); try intuition.
assert (FC: field_compatible (tarray t_struct_list 3) [] (gv _three)) by auto with field_compatible.

repeat match goal with |- _ * (mapsto _ _ _ ?q * _) |-- lseg _ _ _ (offset_val ?n _) _ => assert (FC': field_compatible t_struct_list [] (offset_val n (gv _three))); [apply (@field_compatible_nested_field CompSpecs (tarray t_struct_list 3) [ArraySubsc (n/8)] (gv _three)); simpl; unfold field_compatible in FC |- *; simpl in FC |- *; assert (0 <= n/8 < 3) by (cbv [Z.div]; simpl; omega); tauto |]; apply @lseg_unroll_nonempty1 with q; [destruct (gv _three); try contradiction; intro Hx; inv Hx | normalize; reflexivity | ]; rewrite list_cell_eq by auto; do 2 (apply sepcon_derives; [ unfold field_at; rewrite prop_true_andp by auto with field_compatible; unfold data_at_rec, at_offset; simpl; normalize; try apply derives_refl | ]); clear FC' end.
Lemma body_main: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_main main_spec.
eapply semax_pre; [ eapply ENTAIL_trans; [ | apply (setup_globals Delta gv); auto ] | ].
forward_call (Ews, map Vint [Int.repr 1; Int.repr 2; Int.repr 3], gv _three).
forward_call (Ews, Int.repr 3 :: Int.repr 2 :: Int.repr 1 :: nil, r').
Lemma prog_correct: semax_prog prog Vprog Gprog.

command: focus_SEP 1; apply semax_lseg_nonnull; [ | intros h' r y ? ?].
destruct cts2; inversion H0; clear H0; subst_any.
assert_PROP (field_compatible t_struct_list nil t) as FC by entailer!.
eapply derives_trans; [ | apply (lseg_cons_right_list LS) with (y:=t); auto].
focus_SEP 1; apply semax_lseg_nonnull; [entailer | intros h r y ? ?; simpl].
replace_SEP 2 (field_at sh t_struct_list (DOT _tail) w v) by entailer!.
destruct v; try contradiction; intro Hx; inv Hx.
assert_PROP (size_compatible tuint (gv _three) /\ align_compatible tuint (gv _three)) by (entailer!; clear - H5; hnf in H5; intuition).
rewrite <- mapsto_data_at with (v := Vint(Int.repr 1)); try intuition.
assert (FC: field_compatible (tarray t_struct_list 3) [] (gv _three)) by auto with field_compatible.

repeat match goal with |- _ * (mapsto _ _ _ ?q * _) |-- lseg _ _ _ (offset_val ?n _) _ => assert (FC': field_compatible t_struct_list [] (offset_val n (gv _three))); [apply (@field_compatible_nested_field CompSpecs (tarray t_struct_list 3) [ArraySubsc (n/8)] (gv _three)); simpl; unfold field_compatible in FC |- *; simpl in FC |- *; assert (0 <= n/8 < 3) by (cbv [Z.div]; simpl; omega); tauto |]; apply @lseg_unroll_nonempty1 with q; [destruct (gv _three); try contradiction; intro Hx; inv Hx | normalize; reflexivity | ]; rewrite list_cell_eq by auto; do 2 (apply sepcon_derives; [ unfold field_at; rewrite prop_true_andp by auto with field_compatible; unfold data_at_rec, at_offset; simpl; normalize; try apply derives_refl | ]); clear FC' end.
eapply semax_pre; [ eapply ENTAIL_trans; [ | apply (setup_globals Delta gv); auto ] | ].
forward_call (Ews, map Vint [Int.repr 1; Int.repr 2; Int.repr 3], gv _three).
forward_call (Ews, Int.repr 3 :: Int.repr 2 :: Int.repr 1 :: nil, r').
